kee-auth.description: Library for authentication via Keycloak in KumuluzEE web services.
kee-auth.full-description:
Library for authentication and authorization via Keycloak server of REST resources written with KumuluzEE framework.

KumuluzEE

Kumuluzee is a lightweight open-source framework for developing microservices using standard Java EE technologies and migrating Java EE to cloud-native architecture.

Keycloak

Keycloak is an Open Source Identity and Access Management solution for modern Applications and Services.
kee-auth.name: KeeAuth Library

ngx-config.description: Library for runtime configuration of Angular applications.
ngx-config.full-description:
Library for reading external configuration and applying it to Angular environment configuration. Instead of using harcoded environment object, library reads external JSON configuration (which can be server by the application itself) and overrides values in environment with those in external configuration. By using this library and tools like docker, we can deploy same docker image with different environment values to adjust app for different execution environments.

Angular

Angular Angular is a platform for building mobile and desktop web applications.
ngx-config.name: Angular configuration library
